this soup is as satisfying as your

remove the backbone just by cutting down

they're cut in half put them into your

now
and then some very simple flavorings

leaf
and a few sprigs of thyme and parsley

let that cool continue cooking the broth

when the chicken had been cooked for
about twenty-five minutes I took it out

three and a half hours that really
intensifies the flavor and at this point
it's time to strain you should simmer it
uncovered but have it very low so that
it doesn't reduce too much because
you're wanting to get a yield of about
